title: Fin. Min. offers clarification on USD 1 Bn credit facility agreement with India
body_lines: The Ministry of Finance says Sri Lanka signed the USD 1 billion credit facility agreement with the government of India, to facilitate Sri Lankan importers who faced many difficulties in opening Letters of Credit to import food and other essential items due to the shortage of foreign currency in the banking system and the market.
These remarks came in response to the recent media report titled, ‘Indian Credit for Food Goes to Import Steel’.
